sections: Each entry supports disabled veteran employment around Chicago.
appears aggressive, but it has the bite to back up its bark. In fact, it's the most powerful street-legal production Mustang of all time. The pavement-pounding

is up for grabs through TRI Industries, and you get three times the entries with your donation by using this code as a Motorious.com reader. Not only do you increase your odds by donating, but you help hire disabled veterans in the Chicago area.
Finished in Rapid Red and topped with painted white stripes, an option that is $10,000 alone. On top of that,
is equipped with the Carbon Fiber Track Pack ($18,000), Technology Package ($3,000), and a Shelby Car Cover ($395) for protection. It's safe to say that this venomous snake is loaded.

is the fastest street-legal Mustang to leave the assembly line, we mean that it comes ready with 760-horsepower at your fingertips. Stuffed under the hood is a supercharged 5.2-liter V8 engine that is cabable of sprinting from 0 to 60 in just 3.3 seconds and nabbing a quarter-mile time of 10.6 seconds at 133 miles per hour. Shifting power is provided by a 7-speed dual clutch transmission. While the car is insanely fast, it can be tamed as a daily driver with selectable drive mode and the Magneride suspension system.
